Note that all data (e.g. photos, videos) you generate using this app are stored locally on the device. When you decide to upload your experience, these data will be stored in your Dropbox/Google Drive account. However the experience may not be supported through the WrayDisplay. Once you have published your experience, other people will be able to view and download your experience. We may also analyse your experience for our research purposes and your identity will be kept anonymous.

Please accept that these are prototypes and problems with reliability can occur. However, in case you do experience technical problems (or if you have suggestions for improvements) then please do contact thesharcproject@gmail.com so that we can try to improve the prototypes.

Click the I Agree button to continue or Cancel to quit the app.
